name: 実況ワールドサッカー PERFECT ELEVEN
summary: International Superstar Soccer (実況ワールドサッカーパーフェクトイレブン Jikkyō Wārudo Sakkā Pāfekuto Irebun, "Live World Soccer Perfect Eleven" in Japan) is a football video game developed by Konami for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. It is known as the best soccer game available for any 16-bit systems, mostly due to its lifelike approach, innovative for the time, that showed diversified players in the same team, with an adult look and back numbers on their respective jerseys, corresponding to real-life players of the time.
info:
• 中文名: 国际超级明星足球

  • 别名: 实况世界足球 完美十一人
  • 别名: International Superstar Soccer
  • 别名: 実況ワールドサッカーパーフェクトイレブン
  • 平台: SFC
  • 游戏类型: SPG
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 1994年11月11日
